attributes.action: visibly oppose the slaughter of cats on the island of Rhodes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year, at the end of the tourist season on the Greek island of Rhodes, thousands of the cats the island is famous for are systematically culled using poison, leading to a slow, painful and above all unnecessary death.

We, the undersigned, would ask the Prime Minister to publicly condemn the slaughter, in the hope it may go some way to ending this barbaric practice.
